segments.text: I'm very worried , doctor . I'm afraid that I'm very ill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I feel tired all the time , even when I wake up in the morning . I find it very difficult to do any work . I have no appetite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , yes , I am . I'm worried about my work . I've just taken a new job . I earn a lot of money but it's difficult work . I'm always afraid of making a mistake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there's nothing much wrong with you . You're under too much pressure .
segments.speaker: S2
